ygData.subject: Don't go to Befallen at level 9!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Mikaela wrote: Go to Befallen.  It s a great place for a cleric your level [level 9]. I spent levels 9 - 16 in Befallen in beta and had a blast. Saidinn
ygData.messageBody:
Mikaela wrote:

"Go to Befallen. It's a great place for a cleric your level [level 9].
I spent levels
9 - 16 in Befallen in beta and had a blast."


Saidinn Witchwood responds:

*GASP*

Go to Befallen as a level 9 cleric? HA HA HA HA HA HA HA!

Oh my, that was a good one Mikaela. *shakes head in friendly disbelief*
:)

Wixn, PLEASE don't go to Befallen until you are at least level 15, and
have an experienced group with you. Even then, you will most likely find
yourself spending many happy hours trying to recover your corpse. The
problem is that you will quickly get bored with the first level, and
will convince yourself that the lower levels can't be all that bad.
Well, they are. And the loot isn't all that great, either.

Trust me, I have many friends who swear they will never return to that
place. And these people are good players.

Saidinn Witchwood

P.S. I know there are probably some of you out there who actually love
Befallen, but PLEASE, can we at least agree that Wixl shouldn't go to
Befallen until at least level 15?

P.P.S No hard feelings, Mikaela :)
